short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension replaces all the names of domestic terrorists and mass shooters with 'this one horrible asshole'.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sick of giving attention to the perpetrators of mindless violence? This plugin replaces their names with "This One Horrible Asshole" or "This Asshole".
